title: VIDEO: Troy coach Neal Brown apologizes after loss to Idaho
text: Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest VIDEO: Troy coach Neal Brown apologizes after loss to Idaho Troy coach Neal Brown makes his opening statement and apologizes to fans after the Trojans' 19-16 homecoming loss to Idaho on Saturday.
